main_definition: Pills are small, round or oval medicinal substances encased in a hard shell typically made of compressed powder or tablet form.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of medicine taken by mouth to treat various conditions
meanings_and_examples.example: I have to take these pills three times a day for my high blood pressure.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference to illegal drugs or performance-enhancing substances
meanings_and_examples.example: He was caught with pills in his pocket, indicating drug use.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to a person's lack of interest in work or responsibilities
meanings_and_examples.example: She just sits there like a pill, not doing anything productive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term for money, implying that it can be easily acquired through illegitimate means
meanings_and_examples.example: He's looking to make some quick cash; he says he can get you a few pills if you help him out.
